name: nfc-douyin-video
description: 碰一碰发抖音视频营销工具

scripts.build:all: npm run install:deps && npm run build:client
scripts.install:deps: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.install:all: npm run install:deps && cd worker && npm install
scripts.cf:setup: npm run cf:login && npm run kv:create
scripts.kv:create: wrangler kv:namespace create VIDEO_CACHE && wrangler kv:namespace create VIDEO_CACHE --preview
scripts.secrets:set: wrangler secret put KUAIZI_APP_KEY && wrangler secret put KUAIZI_APP_SECRET && wrangler secret put KUAIZI_ACCOUNT_ID && wrangler secret put DOUYIN_APP_ID && wrangler secret put DOUYIN_APP_SECRET
